title.narrative: Capacity Building for Urban Development Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist the Recipient improve planning for urban management in select urban local bodies and in the roll out of national urban missions.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance, Government of India
Ministry of Housing and Urban Poverty Alleviation

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I.D in Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) appraise and selecturban local bodies in accordance with the criteria and procedures set forth in the Project Operations Manual; and (b) enter into amemorandum of understanding with the selected urban local body on terms and conditions satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Sections I.A.1(a), (b), I.A.2, II.B.1 and II.B.3. | Description: The main change in the legal covenants for thisProject is as a result of the revision to implementation arrangements, i.e., MOHUPA no longer part of the Project, hence it beingremoved from states sections. | Due Date :31-Oct-2015.
